sentences.english: It treats prices like earthquakes or tsunamis, nature acting beyond the power of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 价格就像是地震或海啸，这些自然现象是超乎人力的。

sentences.english: It is the ingratitude of nature.
sentences.chinese: 这种忘怀是属于自然现象。

sentences.english: I study nature because I am curious, like all of us.
sentences.chinese: 我研究自然现象是因为我像大家一样有好奇心。

sentences.english: I was always quite fascinated by natural phenomena and changes of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我总是失魂于自然现象和天空云物的改变。

sentences.english: The eruption of an active volcano is a terrible phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 活火山爆发是一种可怕的自然现象。

sentences.english: Familiarity deadens the sensibilities, even as connected with the gravest natural phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 习惯成自然，人们就是对于重大的自然现象也是如此。

sentences.english: Wonderful phenomena of nature are all around us.
sentences.chinese: 我们身边到处都是奇妙的自然现象。

sentences.english: I study nature because I am curious, like all of us.
sentences.chinese: 我研究自然现象是因为我像大家一样有好奇心。

sentences.english: Every year the monsoon rains trigger an enormous natural phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 每年季风雨一到，就会引发庞大的自然现象。

sentences.english: I am fasciated by my own personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 仅仅作为一种自然现象，我扁我自己的个人外观。

sentences.english: It is a natural phenomenon that is both predictable and certain.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种能够预测且必然发生的自然现象。

sentences.english: There is no such thing as quantitative exactitude in our description of natural phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 可知，在自然现象的描述中也没有精确的量这回事。

sentences.english: Earthquake is the calamitous natural phenomena with huge destructive power.
sentences.chinese: 地震是破坏力巨大的灾害性自然现象。

sentences.english: These include formation of rain, a burning flame of the fruiting of a tree.
sentences.chinese: 这些自然现象包括雨的形成，一颗结果的树的燃烧。

sentences.english: We have proved the superluminal group velocity is an unstable natural phenomenon by experiment.
sentences.chinese: 用实验证明了群速超光速是一种不稳定的自然现象。

sentences.english: We must learn to view change as a natural phenomenon - to anticipate it and to plan for it.
sentences.chinese: 不妨把变化看作一种自然现象，学会感知它，计划它。

definition: the study of seasonal phenomena (flouring, migration etc)

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3
